Title: Remote Backup For Schools and Academies
Description:
Leicestershire County Council (LCC) via  Leicestershire Traded Services - LEAMIS delivers a data backup service for schools within Leicestershire and the surrounding areas.  Currently 273 schools use this service. 

The contracts for the existing software and hardware expire in October 2018.  LEAMIS aims to expand the existing service either by contracting with more schools or by increasing the amount of data backed up at each school. LEAMIS are looking for a solution to mirror/upgrade their current offering to schools giving best value for money, giving the highest-level security and keeping to the latest standards.
